content.detailedDescription:
I was taking photographs in late evening because around sunset the clouds tend to show up in beautiful formations. that night they were primarily brilliant white against the still-bright blue. i had been taking most photographs facing the west/northwest and south, but turned to take a few photographs facing the east and northeast. i didn't see anything other than sky and clouds (and houses and trees) while taking the photographs. 

later, when i looked at the photos on my phone, i noticed a black dot in the upper right corner of one of the photos. after zooming in as much as i could, i realized it was what i thought was a bird in flight high above the horizon. i couldn't tell what kind of bird, except that it seemed like it would have had to be large and it was black. i showed my mom the photo, wondering if she could tell what kind of bird, and her best guess was an eagle.  

i didn't think to look at my bird photo again until later that night, after actually seeing a completely different, but also unknown, object in the sky which i was able to record via my iphone's camera (that object was in the sky to the north/north-west, and was first seen by my father who then called my mom and me out to see it).

after seeing the flying object later that night, i decided to take a second look at my bird photo from earlier, remembering how large it seemed in proportion to the rest of the photograph and thinking i might as well take a second look. i transferred the contents of my iphone's photos in internal storage to my laptop (which has a large screen and an excellent zoom capability!), went through the photos and finally came to the bird photo and when i zoomed in, i was no longer certain it was a bird; whether that's because of what i saw in the sky subsequent to taking this photograph or because it doesn't actually look like a bird, i don't know. (it may very well be a bird; but, that's why i'm submitting it to you!).

the photo i'm submitting along with this report is what i call my "bird photo"; however, there was identifying information (address visible) in the original, full photograph so i simply kept the original aspect ratio and cropped the photo so that information was no longer visible. i tried to keep enough of the photograph visible so that some sense of proportion will be preserved.
content.summary: Black bird-shape high above horizon

content.detailedDescription: On the morning of july 28th, 2017, i witnessed an orb-like object following above and slightly stalking planes landing and taking off from sea-tac intl. airport. it moved in a "lop-sided figure 8" type of pattern. it lasted 8-12 seconds and the object jetted into the clouds in the back ground.
content.summary: Witnessed an orb-like object following above and slightly stalking planes landing and taking off from sea-tac intl. airport. it moved in a "lop-sided figure 8" typer of pattern.

content.detailedDescription:
Our group has been traveling the word studying & documenting the ufo phenomenon in 11 countries were there with night vision, thermal, full spectrum, infrared & visible cameras & emf detector for the documentary project "making contact: be inspired". 

three of us were at this location to continue the same work, with all the photographic & video equipment, cameras & scopes.

we were just east of squamish, bc, canada on the mamquam river forest service road just north of "the chief", a granite monolith, the second biggest in the world of this kind, which is considered sacred by the local indigenous people.

we went there because, in speaking with local people earlier that day, they said orbs have been spotted in the past over & near the mountain. we had driven around the whole area to find this somewhat private spot to view the mountain.

i had turned the recording off on all the cameras to check the batteries, how much was left on the cards, etc & was just casually standing around talking to the others when one member of our group said "is that a plane?" it was exactly 10:59 pm.

so just in case it wasn't a plane, i went to the tripod quickly, hit the record button of the night vision scope fast & found the object in the screen .. there wasn't any time to turn to do anything else, like hitting the record button of the other cameras on the tripod as i wanted to make sure to keep my eye on the screen of the nv & follow it .. as it turned out there was only 10 secs of video captured of the object before it totally disappeared into the deep woods.

while i watched it go across the sky evenly & on a straight path & into the woods, i noticed right away that trees in the foreground blocked out the light, while the trees behind the orb were lit up very brightly. you can hear me in the video saying "oh", because when i saw the trees behind it being lit, and there was no sound, i knew this was no airplane.

we were all quite excited & exhilarated over what we had seen & replayed the video many times to study it & confirm to ourselves that we had something special here.

we had arrived at 5 pm that night & left at 2 am the following morning, with this object the only out of place thing being seen.
content.summary: We watched a large orb move across the sky & into the woods with no sound. trees in front of it blocked the light, while trees behind the object were brightly lit.

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way home from las vegas when i had to use the restroom at boysen reservoir outside shoshone wyoming. after returning to my vehicle i realized that i had locked my keys in the truck. i called my wife to bring me the extra set of keys. i was less than 90 miles from my house. it would take her around 90 minutes to get to me. i snapped a couple of photos of the lake and sent them to my son. it was around 3pm. my wife arrived and was home around 7pm. i downloaded the pictures from my phone into the computer about 15 days later. when i looked at then on the screen something caught my attention on the right side of the picture a little over halfway up. i enlarged it and was not sure what i was looking at. i asked my wife to come look at it at normal size. she said "i see a lake and a ufo".I enlarged it and we both studied it and can not explain what we were looking at.I am retired usaf and after 20 years of service i can't remember seeing anything that looked like it. at the time i took the picture i did not see or hear anything. i would greatly appreciate any information that you could give regarding what this is. i am at home almost everyday. thank you in advance!!
content.summary: Did not see object until i downloaded it into my computer and looked at it then.

content.detailedDescription: I was at the beach with family and we saw dolphins in the river tay. my girlfriend from bulgaria doesn't believe that we have dolphins in the river in scotland so i tried to snap some shots of them with my sony xperia x 23mp camera. i took several pictures while focusing on the water and when i looked back to see if i had caught any dolphins emerging, one of the photographers in the middle of the set taken had a strange brown egg shaped object in the sky. clearly the object is in the distance and is not dirt on or in my lense as my device is waterproof therefor airtight and nothing shows in the pictures  before or after. i just can't explain it.
content.summary: Photos taken before and after even while looking at dolphins. object appears on one photograph in the middle of the set taken. not before or after.

content.detailedDescription: While looking at a bright flickering star on the northern horizon slightly east of the big dipper but below it i saw a very slow object moving extremely bright pulsating light that was moving in a somewhat "up and down" flight path the time was around 10-11pm so the sky was nearly completely dark except for light pollution from the city and around my apartment. i saw no physical surface but believe it may have been a triangular since the light pulsed in a somewhat random order but kept going in the same direction as stated. the light would only pulse one at a time and slowly fade out to black only at the front of the craft and at points "possibly" wingtips. the light mentioned was far brighter than a passenger plane coming in for a landing at night with headlights on. i first thought it was maybe a nova or supernova but it continued to move across the sky so i immediately dismissed that idea. i would like to have this investigated as soon as possible i am extremely sorry for not including photos or video which i know will hamper the investigation if not completely render it invalid
content.summary: Bright randomly pulsating light moved in a west to east direction

content.detailedDescription: The lady that has seen the object every night for over a week. now it comes closer and does not make any noise. the light is so bright you can not look directly at it. last night 7/27/17 it appeared to land behind a barn less than a quarter mile away and emitted a very bright glow. the light then slowly started to fade. on the previous nights it stays stationary with the light coming on occasionally and then moves off horizontally extremely fast. this is out in the country with few houses around. the cattle on the farm next to where this was seen panic and run and moo. this is very frightening for the lady as well. the washington county sherriff's department had two cruisers there last night and i assume they say the light as well.
content.summary: Object stayed off to sw then came closer with intense bright light. appeared to land behind barn at tree line. cattle were going crazy.No sound.

content.detailedDescription:
I did not witness anything. but have vague memory of possiable abduction. i awoke this am with feeling of how did i get into  bed. then when i got up this morning to shower. i noticed pain to my right frontal thigh area. in the location of a heart cath insertion site. when i looked in the mirror i had an injection marking. 
i have had multiple sightings in multiple states and locations. i have had multiple feelings of abductions but never have had anything tangable to show for it. i will iknclude a picture of the injection site. (as a side note, i am a medical professional and know what a heart cath injection site looks like. this is it!!!) this has upset me enough to write a report. i am very concerned. i also feel that i must make a report. someone else has had to have a similar experience. and now i have tangible proof. please have someone contact me, thank you

injected without my permission.
content.summary: Awoke with pain to right thigh area. found injection site at femoral artery area.

content.detailedDescription:
Area (approximation for safety of witness, using alias)

at 3:11 am (e.S.T.), i went on to the back porch, with one of two dogs following me.  while on the back porch, while observing several stars, one started moving, at first, i thought it was my eyes.  nope.  it was moving.  i pleaded with it to stay, comeback (it was dissapearing behind the tree line).  it came back a 2nd time, i called for my sister, it was still visible, i went into the porch (enclosed), and yelled for my sister, sherry....Sherry...Pooked head outsite, still there, went to sisters room twice, she got up on the 2nd attempt.  after the first time trying to get my sister, the object was still visible, and i saw it for a total of three (3) times as well as two (2) shooting stars.  the object moved like a water bug in that it appeared to move not in a straight line but changing direction with every thrust, yet it was as far away as a star.  i have seen objects before and have many childhood occurences.  i was also born with what some say are a "veil" over my head, plus have always had uncanny (so it seemed), supernatural abilities, from guessing who was calling (one time said it was an uncle who hadn't called in years, i was correct) and did things like this all the time growing up. 

see here for additional evidence: i would like to submit an animation or drawing (depending on time). therefore, i will submit a case number 18881 so when i submit my drawing, it can be attached to this report.  this is one of many, but the first in a while.
content.summary: Case 18881 saw what looked like star move like water bug, seen one 3 different times last night.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving down the highway heading towards cameron. the sun was starting to go down it was about 8:15 8:30 it was still light out.I was about a mile from cameron mo. that's when i saw black dot that looked like it was descending from the sky. then i noticed it was coming my way it shot across the highway right in front of my car. i'm guessing it was about 300 to 500 feet above the power lines. i slow down and looked all around for it but never saw it land or shoot off in another direction  i guess i just lost track of it when it went over my car. the ufo looked like a all black cylinder placed on top of a triangle. i'm guessing it was about the length of a semi truck and trailer. from bottom of triangle to top of cylinder looks like about the height of 3 semi stacked on top of each other. the side of the ship looked like it had vents and tubing and maybe like hoses covering the ship almost like they ran the electrical and venting stuff on the outside of the ship hard to tell though cuz everything was black and it was moving very fast. so when it flew over the top of my car i noticed it made of whirring sound and that the bottom was smooth when i looked up at it it just looked like a shadow making whirring noise. after that i lost sight of it.
content.summary: Black cylinder shape on top of flat surface

content.detailedDescription:
When i was about 14 (which would be around about 1992/93), i did the ‘lyke wake walk’ with my scout troop and my dad. it’s a 40 mile, 24 hour walk, over the north yorkshire moors (in the uk). starting inland at osmotherley, and ending on the coast at ravenscar.
at some point in the overnight portion of the walk (it was pitch black, but a clear night, so lit by stars and the moon), i would guess in the early hours (we’d been walking for some time, and i remember we finished the walk in the morning of the next day), when i was walking with just my dad, some distance from any other walkers, we saw in the sky a group (or series?) of round, bright light, or lighted objects, moving erratically. it being very dark, and the lights being rather bright, we (or at least i, i haven’t discussed it in detail with my dad) couldn’t make out the size or distance of the lights – they could have been enormous and far away, or smaller and closer. i certainly remember their movements – they would hover, totally still, and then ‘zip’ in straight lines, with some speed, to another spot, hover, and then move again. again, i can’t estimate their speed, as i didn’t have any reference for their size or their distance away (it wasn’t close, and they were certainly high up, so it wasn’t that near to us, which leaves me to believe they moved very quickly). i would guess they were visible for 2/3 minutes, before they moved away again (behind what i would generously call a hill, though ‘rise’ would be a better description).
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: We saw in the sky a group of round, bright light, or lighted objects, moving erratically, hovering and changing direction.

content.detailedDescription: Hi dear. i'm going to supermarket . than l see sky and see brilliant object first l think it's jupiter but object moving slowly.Than l record this event with my phone . have great day with ufos :)
content.summary: It's brilliant as moon and move and l start to record this with my phone

content.detailedDescription: I have contacted you guys last year about being abducted and i have been again with another mark. i did not follow up with you after i reported the last abduction, i ended having to have a historectomy. i deleted my emails with the people i was in contact with before. please contact me.
content.summary: I was abducted again

content.detailedDescription: 5 objects to the south-east of humacao puerto rico (pr). one of them constantly represented an inverted cross red light which scared me (just a little) since i do not know if it represent some sort of warning. i feel there is a connection path at the south-east area since all the movements are related between east-west and north-south crossing through the south-east area of pr.
content.summary: 5 objects to the south-easth of humacao puerto rico. one of them constantly represented an inverted cross red light.

content.detailedDescription: Walking into my driveway i saw a light comming out of the left hoprizon and about the same time another light comming from the right. they cropssed each other in the middle and each disapered below the horizon. i called the air force and they only laughed at me and hung up. when i told my buddy about it he informed me that the speed must have been great. we have nothing that fast. i just saw you on history and decided to share with you.  this happened in santa maria but i am now living over 30 years in germany.
content.summary: From left horizon to right and visa versa

content.detailedDescription: I was at boeing plant making a delivery to bldg 40-51 on the south side at 11:04 pm. i was looking at east near the horizon, when i noticed what looked like 3 stars moving in a triangluar formation moving from west to east above the cascade mountains (that cannot be seen at night)which are about 30 to 40 miles away. i then noticed another 2 to 3 lights that also looked like stars in the night sky that was with that group in a triangluar formation. the lights then made a slow vertical circlular loop as one group, most became stationary. the lights then faded and disaappeared in about 15 seconds. the whole sighting was about 1 minute. it was hard to determine distance, but it looked like it was over the cascade mountains around the general area near mt glacier peak(an isolated mountain and sleeping volcano that had an ufo sighting on 5 oct 16). these lights did not have tell-tale signs of regular aircraft: strobe lights or red/green navigation lights nor do aircraft fly in loops in formation at night.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I saw what looked liked 3 moving stars in a triangle formation. then there was 2 to 3 other objects that looked like stars that was with that triangle formation just above the cascades(near mt glacier peak). the lights made vertical circle and faded away

content.detailedDescription: Hello my ufo sigth was in the early 1990's i was sleep and my brother came into my room and wake me up ! he say come on  there is something you have  to see! i say to him i wanna sleep let me stay in bed to sleep! but he say get up and have a look in to it! so i get up and follow him to his  room! then we looked out of his room window! in same second i get (gänsehaut) all my hair was standing up like electric static! there was an flying objekt above the fields after the house we live in! i cant describe the form or the ligthsfrom it( like change permanent) so i was interested because i never seen something like  it! we open the window so i hear deep grolling noise ! not like helikopter not like plane or traktor! i was like it so i hold my arm out of the window to send them a signal and the objekt was fly in same direktion like ido my arm! my brother stand at my side like paralized ! i was interested and frigthend at same time because the objekt was like (ferngesteuert! sorry for my very baad english) i tell my brother i will get on my clothes and go to the objekt come with me ! but he say no ! i was arround 13 years old and to frigthend to go there alone! so i send them more signals with my arm and objekt again fly like ido my arm! this was a time from about five minits! but it feels like a hour! was i really tell them their direktion?? i wanna know more and go there but brother still said no! so i do my arm back into the room! a few seconds later the objekt leave the place fast like a  comet ! we stand there next five minits but nothing came back but i remeber it was quiet no noise to hear no bird or gras hopper nonothing! next nigths i wait for it but nothing!
content.summary: Non describle foarm with ligth and deep sound
Wife saw a man between 1 ft to 1and a half foot tall

content.detailedDescription: Object appeared on picture taken during the day while driving in mountains in pr
content.summary: Object appeared on picture taken during the day while driving in mountains in pr

content.detailedDescription: Driving east stopping at a stop sign and caught a glimmer of something approximately 500 ft out of my driver side window. there is an airport in the area but this wasn't a plane. at first thought it could be balloons but after stopping someone, they were as stunned as i was. i took several photo's all the way back to my house.  it changed shape and hovered in one spot.  not a helicopter either.
content.summary: Observed a oddly shaped and reflective object going against the wind. myself and another person witnessed

content.detailedDescription: I was outside sitting on the steps leading up to my apartment smoking a cigarette looking at the sky, which had been completely cover by clouds all night.  up until this moment, i hadn't noticed a single star peek out of the clouds all night.  to my left (west) were two very faint stars close to one another trying their best to peek out of the clouds, and to my right (east) i saw a very bring star, alone, almost looking at me.  it was about 45 degrees up, out over another one of the apartment buildings.  i first thought it was a plane becayse it was so bright and the clouds weren't letting pretty much any stars show, but it stayed in the same spot.  but it almost seemed like it was moving, it was twinkling a lot.  i started at it for several minutes trying to figure out if it was a plane or not.  it was weird, you just know a star when you see one.  i couldn't stop starring at this.  it seemed like it was just hovering there, slight movements miles away making it seem like twinkling.  i wasn't very alarmed, a little creeped out but not creeped out to do anything i guess. afterward i just went inside, i didn't watch it or anything like that.  maybe i should have.
content.summary: Thick clouds all night, then very bright star appears, thought it was the north star but it was east, twinkled so much almost look like it was moving,

content.detailedDescription: Triangle
content.summary: Fast flying object, triangular.

content.detailedDescription: I was laying by the pool with my daughter looking up to the sky when i saw a capsule-like object flying over about 1 mile away maybe. it was completely silent and hard to see. i was able to film a few seconds of it before it disappeared behind the clouds. a few seconds later, a small airplane flew in the same direction but right over us, about 1 mile from the object.
content.summary: Saw what looked like a "capsule" flying over louisville.

content.detailedDescription: In the city of rocky point in sandy beach me and my wife noticed a glowing orange star like object moving slowly for a few minutes and then vanished around 10:30pm pst. it was not a plane nor a balloon.  i've never seen anything that got my attention.
content.summary: Orange star like object flying

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was walking home with my partner from the store when i saw two very bright star like lights in the sky. upon looking further i noticed they were out of place compared to the constellations and planets in the sky at the time. we continued to watch the objects, assuming at first that it was an aircraft of some kind, but it did not move or have any body mass, as i could see other stars around the two bright points. after about 2 minutes we witnessed both bright lights fade over the course of about 10-15 seconds. once they faded to around the brightness of a satellite, we witnessed three more lights of the same brightness join them our of nowhere and swirl around, changing positions and then very quickly (faster than any satellite we've ever seen) take off northward. we watched them until they were too far away for us to see.
content.summary: Two bright lights that hovered, then dimmed and joined three more dim lights and took off northward.

content.detailedDescription: Watching for meteor shower around 12am saw a couple go by, then a dim moved in the opposite direction of the meteor shower and stopped and flashed a extremely bright light, hovered stayed flashing light at different levels of brightness. then started moving again very slow repeating the flashes. ran inside got my binoculars and when it flashed bright you could make out a black shape looked rectangular. then went dim and flew off to the north. i checked the space app and no satellites or rocket bodies were flying over.
content.summary: Appeared flashed light dim to extremely bright move a little and repeat

content.detailedDescription:
My girlfriend and i were visiting colorado and camped in the great sand dunes national park. after the sun set we were east of the face of the sand dunes located on a path that follows the medano creek. we took the sandy off-road path in the car and pulled off to hike. we got to a point where we stopped to stargaze. looking at the stars for a while and not talking, an object appeared to be moving back and forth above the mountain between two points. the object was not blinking, rather, it was glowing. it was white/off-white*. the object moved very precisely between the two points, it did not waver or turn around. instead, it stopped precisely at one spot, stayed still for a moment or two, then darted back to the other point. this happened four to five times. it then followed the edge of the mountain and disappeared, leaving no trace. my girlfriend and i looked at each other immediately after watching this happen in disbelief to confirm that we both saw it. 

*the color of the object is the only variable between both of our stories, she says it was the color of a standard star, i thought the color had a pinkish hue. 

11:12 pm est 7/27/17

-jg
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Light hovering above mountains hovered over 2 spots and then disappeared under mountain

content.detailedDescription: My cousin and i were driving from town back to the property both of our houses are on, about 5 miles from town. it was dark out and since the moon is waning and we live in a very rural town it was quite dark. all of a sudden out of no where we both see at the same a large object in the sky. it was glowing green and appeared to be falling slowly, in a descending manner. it was difficult to calculate how far above or how far from us the object was. it couldn't have been too much higher than the trees though or more than 3 miles away from us. we did not investigate. i thought maybe someone shot off a flare or even a strange bug, but its size was too big. neither of us are sure what we saw but one of my friends suggested reporting to yall.
content.summary: Bright, large green glowing object slowly descending from the sky then vanished

content.detailedDescription: I was headed toward las vegas on highway 93.  i noticed a bright light in the distance and thought it was a plane. after traveling for sometime i noticed that it had not moved.  two more lights turned on, forming a triangle. it hovered above the mountain range.  for some reason,  i felt like i shouldn't have been looking at it. that's when i decided to take a short video which i posted on facebook. right after i started recording video a small flashing orb began to fall from it.  as the road begin to wind more, i could not continue to watch the object.  about a week and a half from that day, i was going through photos to delete and make space when i came across the video. i had honestly forgotten that i had taken it.  the small blue light on the left side in the video is a reflection of the led on the charger of my phone.
content.summary: triangle of lights dropping flashing orbs

content.detailedDescription: Just got off work, stopped at neighborhood bar for a beer. as i was outside talking to a friend, i looked up and noticed a shiny silver cylinder shape object. it was reflecting the sun. moving slowly, and large enough to notice it had no visible wings. it was daytime, so no visible lights. i did take video of it on zoom with my samsung s8. i thought it was a plane at first, but noticed no surface features like wings. it disappeared after about a minute. just faded out. i cannot make my phone send the video so please email me and i will send video
content.summary: Was looking up, saw slow moving silver cylinder. no wings
